Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.Model

Class Space

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.Model.Space
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Space
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Space contains all the space data and a reference to the board it belongs to
See Also:

      public Space​(int xPosition, int yPosition, Board board)
      Constructor

      xPosition - X-coordinate on the board
      yPosition - Y-coordinate on the board
      board - The board that the space belongs to

  • Method Details

    • getXPosition

      public int getXPosition()
      Returns:
      the space X-coordinate on the board

    • getYPosition

      public int getYPosition()
      Returns:
      the space Y-coordinate on the board

    • getCoordinates

      public int[] getCoordinates()
      Returns:
      an Array that contains both the space coordinates

    • getHeight

      public Block getHeight()
      Returns:
      space height. Possible values are: - LEVEL 0 - LEVEL 1 - LEVEL 2 - LEVEL 3 - DOME

    • getNextHeight

      public Block getNextHeight()

    • setHeight

      public void setHeight​(Block height)
      Parameters:
      height - Refers to the space height

    • getWorker

      public Worker getWorker()
      Returns:
      the worker that currently occupies the space

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(Worker worker)
      Parameters:
      worker - Indicates that the space is now occupied by this worker

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Returns:
      a boolean: true if the space is occupied, false otherwise

    • getNeighbors

      public java.util.ArrayList<Space> getNeighbors()
      Used to get all the neighboring spaces
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the neighboring spaces

    • thereIsNext

      public boolean thereIsNext​(int movementOnX, int movementOnY)
      Checks if there's a neighboring space in the direction (X,Y) from the actual space. Direction (1,0) is East, (1,-1) North-East, (0,-1) North, (-1,-1) North-West, (-1,0) West, (0,1) South, (-1,1) South-West, (1,1) South-East
      Parameters:
      movementOnX - X-coordinate of the movement
      movementOnY - Y-coordinate of the movement
      Returns:
      a boolean: true if a space exists and it's not blocked permanently by a DOME, false otherwise

    • getNext

      public Space getNext​(int movementOnX, int movementOnY)
      Parameters:
      movementOnX - X-coordinate of the movement
      movementOnY - Y-coordinate of the movement
      Returns:
      the neighboring space in the direction (X,Y) from the actual space

    • getDirection

      public int[] getDirection​(Space nextSpace)
      gets the (X,Y) direction needed to reach nextSpace from this space
      Parameters:
      nextSpace - Space where to move
      Returns:
      the difference of coordinates between nextSpace and this space
